name: Fast Gallery Lite
author: ad-theme

sections.description:
Welcome to Fast Gallery. With this awesome plugin you can build your gallery in 1 minute. You have available 3 types of gallery (Prettyphoto, Photobox, Magnificer Popup) using masonry, grid with responsive or fluid layout and more features.

List all Features:

Gallery with Magnificer Popup
10 Different Styles
Custom color for gallery (Main color with opacity and Secondary color)
Masonry / Grid
Responsive / Fluid
Widget Support
Translation Ready (include .po/.mo files)
1 Column, 2 Columns, 3 Columns, 4 Columns, 5 Columns, 6 Columns, 7 Columns, 8 Columns, 9 Columns
Revers Order
Extend media gallery wordpress

Pro version: http://plugins.ad-theme.com/fastgallery/

Guide:

  1. Go to page / post
  2. Press ADD Media
  3. Press Create Gallery
  4. Upload or select your photos
  5. After Select Press Create New Gallery
  6. Now in right windows you have available all the features of FAST GALLERY
  7. Press Insert Gallery and press View Page
  8. Finish. Enjoy

Resources

Magnific Popup © 2013 Dmitry Semenov http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/
sections.installation:
1. Install Fast Gallery Lite either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate Fast Gallery Lite.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install Fast Gallery Lite either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate Fast Gallery Lite.
